docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 6.--A new epoch in Pan American commercial relations will date from the second Pan American Commercial Conference, Director General John Barrett of the Pan American Union, presiding officer of the present initial conference, declared...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 6.--A new epoch in Pan American commercial relations will date from the second Pan American Commercial Conference, Director General John Barrett of the Pan American Union, presiding officer of the present initial conference, declared in summing up the achievements of the meeting at its concluding session today.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 9.--The full text of the proposed Treaty of Peace between the associated powers and Germany will be published in the Congressional Record tomorrow, and is herewith presented from proofs supplied to THE NEW YORK TIMES tonight by the...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 9.--The full text of the proposed Treaty of Peace between the associated powers and Germany will be published in the Congressional Record tomorrow, and is herewith presented from proofs supplied to THE NEW YORK TIMES tonight by the Government Printing Office.

headline.main: FULL TEXT OF THE PROPOSED TREATY OF PEACE, AS DRAWN BY THE CONFERENCE AT PARIS, AND ISSUED BY THE UNITED STATES SENATE; VAST DETAILS COVERED IN DOCUMENT Boundaries of the Defeated Teutonic Powers and of Newly Created Nations Are Set Forth. FULL TEXT OF THE LEAGUE COVENANT AS REVISED Alsace Provisions Are Very Elaborate--Clauses as to the Sarre Basin Very Precise--Sharp Curb Put on Germany's Military and Naval Power.
